ABOUT US
Nestled within a serene 630-acre nature preserve just east of Collier Boulevard (CR 951),
Forest Glen Golf & Country Club
is a distinguished community for those who seek a vibrant, active lifestyle in an unparalleled natural setting. Located only 15 minutes from both downtown Naples and Marco Island, residents enjoy quick access to world-class beaches, shopping, dining, and top-tier medical facilities. Interstate 75 is just one mile from the entrance, providing convenient connections to Southwest Florida International Airport (30 minutes) and Fort Lauderdale and Florida‚Äôs East Coast (90 minutes).
Championship Golf Reimagined
Originally redesigned in 2008 by the acclaimed Arthur Hills-Steve Forrest team, Forest Glen's golf course received another major enhancement in 2024, timed with the Club‚Äôs 25th anniversary. Renowned golf architect
Ron Forse
was brought in to elevate the experience even further. Key improvements included the transition of the greens to
TifEagle
, surrounds to
TifGrand
, and continued use of
Sea Isle Supreme Paspalum
throughout the course‚Äîdelivering pristine playability and exceptional aesthetics.
The result is a stunning
6,820-yard Championship course
that is enjoyable and challenging for golfers of all skill levels. Complementing the course is a newly upgraded
practice facility
, featuring a large putting green, a dedicated short game area, and multiple hitting bays on the driving range.
A Full-Service Lifestyle Community
Forest Glen is much more than just great golf. Residents enjoy:
Tennis, Pickleball, and Bocce Programs
with active leagues and clinics
On-site Fitness Center
with cardio and strength training equipment
Paved Nature Trails
for biking, jogging, or leisurely strolls
Social Activities
including Book Club, Bridge, Mahjong, Men's Poker, and more
Computer Station
with Wi-Fi access for your convenience
Dining & Entertainment
From elegant dinners to casual poolside cocktails, Forest Glen‚Äôs dining options are designed to satisfy every occasion and craving:
Main Clubhouse Dining
for upscale and casual meals
Eagles Nest Poolside Bar & Grill
, offering tropical drinks and al fresco dining in a relaxed setting
Special Events & Social Gatherings
held throughout the year, fostering community and camaraderie
At Forest Glen Golf & Country Club
, whether you're unwinding with friends, honing your golf game, or enjoying a sunset dinner by the pool, you'll find yourself surrounded by natural beauty, exceptional amenities, and friendly neighbors. It's not just a club‚Äîit's your everyday escape.
Tour of the Community
Site Plan
General Information
Mission Statement
The mission of Forest Glen is to be a financially sound common interest country club community dedicated to the casual recreational resort lifestyle of our members through our facilities and social activities.
Vision Statement
Forest Glen provides a secure residential community of individual enclaves under the unity of common Goals:
Promote our premier membership services and communications
Ensure financial stability to meet evolving operations and maintain adequate reserves for capital replacement needs
Continually maintain and enhance our superb golf facilities and resort amenities to competitive country club standards
Adhere to a transparent governing process guided by complimentary master and neighborhood documents
Maintain common areas of the entire community to a first rate unified standard
Enhance our financial position by continued use of facilities through selective profitable nonmember events that do not inconvenience the members
Forest Glen Golf & Country Club
3855 Forest Glen Blvd.
Naples, FL 34114
